passive.name: ORGANIC DECONSTRUCTION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) ORGANIC DECONSTRUCTION
                                Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

q.name: (Q) PLASMA FISSION
q.description:
(Q) PLASMA FISSION
Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

e.name: (E) TECTONIC DISRUPTION
e.description:
(E) TECTONIC DISRUPTION
Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

r.name: (R) LIFE FORM DISINTEGRATION RAY
r.description:
(R) LIFE FORM DISINTEGRATION RAY
Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
situational_items_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.

keystone_detailed.description: You and your nearby ally gain a shield when either of you would take damage from an enemy champion.
